Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents

Class Ghost1

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.GameEntities
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.Enemy
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.Ghost1
public class Ghost1 extends Enemy
Represents a Ghost enemy in the game, extending the Enemy class. A Ghost enemy uses the A* pathfinding algorithm to navigate the game map.
